A grant program that aims to get incoming college students living in the residence halls more active and able in their communities.

HARP Grant Program

Our Mission

31 Dec 2013

The mission of the HAPR Grant Program is to encourage students, particulary those just starting at a university, to collaborate and being to work on projects that are both interesting to them and beneficial to the community that they live in.

Jekyll is a simple, blog aware, static site generator. It takes a template directory [...] and spits out a complete, static website suitable for serving with Apache or your favorite web server.
